tps-header.description: The Solana Network is currently operating at a limited capacity, your on-chain actions have increased chance of failing.

balances.zebec-despoited-balance-detail: Deposited balance is the overall sum of all the tokens deposited on Zebec. This balance may not be accurate as balance rate are not available for all tokens.
balances.treasury-despoited-balance-detail: Deposited balance is the overall sum of all the tokens deposited on this treasury. This balance may not be accurate as balance rate are not available for all tokens.
balances.total-withdrawable-amount-detail: Whenever you receive token, you have to withdraw it individually for each transaction. Go to the Incoming tab and then proceed to Withdraw.

deposit-withdrawal.deposit-title: Deposit assets into your Zebec wallet.
deposit-withdrawal.withdraw-title: Withdraw deposited Zebec assets into your wallet.
deposit-withdrawal.max-withdraw-message: Max balance is equals to the depocited balance minus streaming balance.

wallet-not-connected.title: Wallet not connected!
wallet-not-connected.description: Looks like your wallet is not connected. Please connect your wallet to keep using Zebec.

support.zebec-help-description: Browse through our support articles or get in touch with our Support Team through Discord.
support.treasury-help-description: Browse through our support articles or get in touch with our Support Team through Discord.
support.streaming-help-details: Browse through our support articles to learn about stream or get in touch with our Support Team through Discord.
support.build-description: Use our SDKs to easily implement Zebec Pay features directly into your projects.
support.feedback-description: We’ll be pleased if you have suggestions on how to improve Zebec.

notifications.notification-subtitle: Get notified about the transactions in your email.
notifications.unsubscribe-description: Don’t want to receive any emails or telegram message about your transactions?

settings.email-subtitle: This is why we need it and how it’s going to be used.
settings.default-explorer-details: Choose a default explorer to view your transactions.

modal-actions.wallet-approval-message: After your wallet approval, your transaction will be complete in a few seconds

deposited-assets.no-tokens-found: No token found. Try searching with different keyword.

page-not-found-message: Oops, The page you are looking for couldn’t be found! Please enjoy this cute cat illustration.
no-receiver-found: No receiver wallet found with given query.
